document.full_text: fallen fashion designer john galliano will stand trial on june 22 in paris for hurling anti-semitic insults at people in a parisian bar in a case that has already cost him his job at luxury label dior.
document.title: scandal-hit galliano's racism trial set for june 22
lines_and_colors: fallen fashion designer john galliano will stand trial on june 22 in paris for hurling anti-semitic insults at people in a parisian bar in a case that has already cost him his job at luxury label dior.
